2017/KER/49768
B. KEMAL PASHA, J.
Dated this the 8" day of December, 2017
ORDER
On the basis of Annexure-lll report filed by the
Sub Inspector of Police, Badiadka Police Station,
proceedings under Section 107 Cr.P.C. have been initiated
against the petitioners. The report shows that the petitioners
are two among the accused in two crimes. One crime is
Crime No.140/2017 of Badiadka Police Station for the
offences under Sections 143, 147, 341, 323 and 506(i) read
with Section 149 IPC and the other crime is Crime
No.326/2017 of Badiadka Police Station for the offences
under Sections 341 and 323 read with Section 34 IPC.
Apart from these two crimes, no other crimes have been
registered against the petitioners.
2. Based on the aforesaid aspects alone, the

petitioners cannot be trapped in proceedings under Section
107 Cr.P.C. Matters being so, Annexure-l order is liable to
